data.actual_result: Chat scrolling & typing become frozen, you can still see new messages being sent by other users though
data.expected_result: Chat doesn't freeze up, forcing you to restart to fix
data.short_description: Chat locks-up and you cannot type or scroll after going into someone's profile, opening a mutual friend's profile, then hitting close on both profiles quickly
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a user's profile whom you have mutual friends with - Open the profile of one of their mutual friends - Tap close on both profiles
